entry.title: Almond Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Cleanser
Price: 25.00

Who doesn't love a good cleansing balm? Melt away makeup and remove impurities at the end of the day with our brand new soothing and calming skin cleansing balm. Made using a blend of all natural ingredients and organic botanical oils, this balm will leave skin feeling clean, nourished and hydrated. 

Suitable for daily use and perfect for all skin types. Recommended as part of your PM skincare routine. No fragrance added.

Key Ingredients and Benefits

  • Organic Sweet Almond Oil - This beautiful botanical oil relieves dryness, keeps skin hydrated and relieves itching sensations due to it being naturally rich in Vitamin E. It is also perfect for those with more oily skin as it cleans impurities, dirt and excess oil from pores. Almond oil is quickly absorbed and keeps moisture in your skin balanced.
  • Organic Sunflower Oil - Improve skin texture and redness with this beautiful anti-inflammatory oil. Rich in Linoleic Acid (Omega-6 fatty acid) and Vitamin E, this oil is perfect for those with dry skin as it improves hydration.Rich in antioxidants such as Vitamin A, C , D and E , this oil will also help fight acne causing bacteria while protecting skin.
  • Organic Castor Seed Oil - A natural hydrating and moisturizing oil which has antibacterial properties and is rich in antioxidants. Naturally antibacterial and anti-inflammatory, this oil is rich in ricinoleic acid which hydrates and treats inflamed skin.
  • White Kaolin Clay - A mild and gentle clay which provides a gentle exfoliation which clears pores, soothes skin and absorbs excess oil which can cause blemishes or acne. Continued use of kaolin clay can also improve skins overall appearance and tone.
  • Colloidal Oatmeal - Proven to sooth redness and skin irritations caused by common skin issues such as acne, eczema and psoriasis. Restorative, hydrating and soothing, this amazing superfood deeply cleanses and provides a gentle exfoliation.

How to use

Scoop out a desired amount with dry fingers and massage onto skin. Add water to emulsify. Rinse off excess balm with water or wipe away with a damp cloth or reusable cotton round. Pairs perfectly with our Eye Makeup Remover and Cleansing Oil.

Full Ingredients List 

Prunus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Stearic Acid, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Glycerine, Avena Sativa (Oat) Powder, White Kaolin Clay, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Xanthan gum. *Organic ingredient 

Product Information

  • All natural, cruelty free, vegan cleanser
  • Fragrance free, PEG free, non toxic ingredients
  • Not recommended for topical use for those with a tree nut allergy
  • 4 oz recyclable/reusable glass jar packaging with recyclable plastic lid
  • Due to being an oil based product, it is preservative free. Please do not store in shower and avoid direct contact with water. Apply using dry fingers and emulsify when it is on the skin.
  • Do not get directly in eyes
  • Store in a cool, dry place
  • Shelf life 12 months after opening with proper storage
  • Stop use immediately if any irritation occurs

entry.title: Reusable Organic Cotton Facial Rounds - Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Washable Reusable Organic Cotton Rounds
Price: 15.00

Reusable bubblegum pink facial rounds made from 100% organic cotton! These reusable cotton rounds are the perfect replacement for single-use cotton pads, cotton balls and make up remover wipes. Each reusable cotton round can be washed over 200 times making them the perfect eco-friendly alternative in your skincare routine. 

Features + Benefits

  • 10-pack of 3" diameter pads and mesh wash/carry bag both made from 100% GOTS Certified organic cotton 
  • Organic cotton reusable facial rounds can be washed over 200 times
  • Sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to disposable cotton pads and make up remover wipes
  • 3 layers of organic cotton make these reusable cotton rounds extremely soft and extremely durable
  • Pink coloured reusable cotton facial rounds are perfect for applying and removing skincare and beauty products

How to use

Use these organic cotton face wipes to remove makeup, cleanse your face, for applying toner or whatever else you need them for throughout your skincare routine. Once used, simply throw used rounds into your new wash bag and toss them into your machine.

Make sure you wash all your pads before first use. Wash on medium cycle. Air-dry pads after wash to maintain shape or line dry.

entry.title: RENEW Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

Toners are a valuable part of your skincare routine. RENEW Toner restores moisture to the skin and improves texture. Apply to a clean face to help your skin absorb the nourishing benefits. Hydrating and corrective toner.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Boswellia Thurifera (Frankincense) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil.

entry.title: CLARITY Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

The second step in your skincare regimen helps to minimize the amount of dirt/oil/bacteria that gets back into your pores. Mist over your face to rebalance and gently minimize pores.  For oily and acne prone skin types.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate,  Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Colloidal Silver, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Eucalyptus Globulus Oil, Melaleuca Alernifolia (Tea Tree) Oil Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove Leaf) Oil.

Toners are a valuable part of your skincare routine. BALANCE Toner restores moisture to the skin and improves texture. Apply to a clean face to help your skin absorb the nourishing benefits of your serum and moisturizer. Lightweight and clarifying.

entry.title: Recovery Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 13.00

Recovery Salve is great for when your body aches after a tough climbing session or long work day! Perfect for athletes to help soothe tension and pains.

Infused with anti-inflammatories, Arnica flowers and Menthol (found naturally in peppermint) for relief from inflammations, bruises and tension in the body. 


Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How to use

Massage salve onto sore areas as needed. Should feel a slight cooling, refreshing sensation, but not overpowering.

CAUTION: Please wash hands before touching face as menthol will irritate eyes! If needed, rise out with soap and water. For external use only!

Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Menthol, Candelilla wax, Arnica, Magnesium, and Essential oils of Camphor, Clove, Rosemary, and Lavender.

entry.title: Vegan Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 12.00

Use Onsight Vegan Skin Salve to keep skin in its best condition after a tough day of rock climbing, work or everyday life. Our salve is for everyone who is rough on their hands and needs some soothing repair after a long day. Great for dry skin, cuts and scrapes.

Vegan Skin Salve is formulated to absorb quick so it's less greasy than traditional salves. Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

Ingredients

entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Charcoal Konjac Sponge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Konjac Sponge
Price: 10.00

Introducing the perfect beauty and skincare tool for all skin types but particularly for oily or acne prone skin. This amazing organic and biodegradable konjac sponge is infused with activated charcoal which acts like a magnet to dirt, oil and impurities in your skin.

This sponge can be used on its own or paired with your favourite cleanser for a deep clean.

This sponge comes packaged in a cute 100% recyclable paper box making the entire product 100% waste free!

Each sponge lasts approx. 100 uses and can be placed in your home compost bin once finished with.

These sponges are all natural, cruelty free, vegan, biodegradable and compostable!

What is Konjac?

Konjac is a 100% natural and soluble vegetable fibre which is 100% biodegradable

How to use

For first use, simply run sponge under running water for 2-3 minutes and watch as the sponge expands and becomes soft.

Squeeze out excess water and add your favourite cleanser or used on its own in light circular motions. Not only will this sponge absorb impurities and excess oil from the skin but it will also provide a gentle exfoliation. Once done, simply rinse and hang by its string to dry. 

Whenever you wish to use sponge, simply reactivate it under warm water. 

Sponge can be hung to dry using attached string on bathroom sink or in the shower.

Made from 

100% organic biodegradable konjac sponge and infused with activated charcoal powder

entry.title: Ocular Eye Serum for Reducing Dark Circles, Puffiness & Fine Lines
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Eye Serum
Price: 25.00

Ocular was created specifically for the delicate skin around the eye to help reduce dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines while also serving as a vital protective layer against pollution and the chemicals found in makeup.

Features + Benefits

  • Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Vegan, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade
  • 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin
  • 94.88% of the total ingredients are from organic farming
  • Remaining 5.12% are naturally organic ingredients such as vitamins & minerals

How to use

Always make sure the serum is shaken well before applying so that all the key ingredients are present in each application.

After cleansing with the Skin Essence Organics Pure or Fresh facial cleanser, massage the Ocular eye serum into the skin around the eye bone for approximately 10 to 20 seconds. This will ensure deep absorption of the ingredients.

Wait approximately 5 minutes for full absorption of the formula before applying any makeup over top.

Tip: The special dropper cap used on this product carefully controls how much is released and stops the dirt and air from entering into the package, keeping it fresh. To easily release one drop at a time, simply hold the bottle upside down and “tap” the bottom of the bottle with your finger.

Composition

This unique serum contains a variety of nourishing extracts that offer a complete anti-aging blend. (Non-comedogenic)

Ingredients

Rosehip Seed Oil*, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Hemp Seed Oil*, Borage Seed Oil*, Apricot Kernel Oil*, Nettle Leaf Extract*, Olive Oil*, Kukui Nut Oil, Blue Chamomile Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E), Zinc Oxide (Non-Nano) *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Chocolate Mandarin Hand, Body and Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Skin Treatment
Price: 18.00

This rich balm is ideal for moisturizing and soothing dry, rough skin. Within a few seconds of application the skin appears and feels noticeably softer and smoother. Chocolate Mandarin is an excellent option for those who have dehydrated skin, as the key ingredients offer a rich, long lasting hydration that help to naturally improve the skin’s overall elasticity, texture and moisture.

Features + Benefits

  • Hydrates and soothes dry, chapped, and sensitive skin
  • Offers rich, long lasting hydration for dry hands, heels, and lips
  • Naturally concentrated formula helps maintain softer, smoother skin
  • Subtle cocoa butter and orange natural aroma.
  • Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

Composition

This fresh organic formulation effectively softens and nourishes, while the vast amount of cocoa butter keeps the skin flexible, sealing in moisture.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Cocoa Butter*, Beeswax, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Castor Oil*, Orange Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E) *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: E-Cream Soothing Skin Treatment Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Skin Treatment
Price: 22.00

E-Cream is a delicately balanced skin balm that contains a wide variety of plant extracts which offer excellent calming, soothing and anti-inflammatory benefits. E-Cream is ideal for helping to soothe and reduce the effects of eczema, redness, sun burns, insect bites, and dry/itchy skin.

This unique formula can be used anywhere on the body, including the face as a daily moisturizer.

Features + Benefits

  • Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

How to use

Rub E-Cream onto skin as needed.


Best results with repeated applications.


Composition

This product is formulated using the highest concentration of plant extracts possible and has been carefully balanced to create a truly effective and soothing skin balm.

Ingredients

Calendula Flower Extract*, Beeswax, Chickweed Extract*, Gotu Kola Extract*, Nettle Leaf Extract*, Olive Oil*, Zinc Oxide (Non- Nano), Oat Extract*, White Kaolin Clay, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Peppermint Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E), Blue Chamomile Oil*, Galbanum Oil* *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Light Facial Moisturizer for Oily & Acne Prone Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Facial Moisturizers & Serums
Price: 32.00

This product is designed specifically for acne and/or oily prone skin that requires light hydration. The extracts and essential oils used in this formula contain natural healing, anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, which help to keep the skin clean and clear, preventing breakouts.

Features + Benefits

  • This oil based moisturizer provides light and fast absorbing hydration and is non-comedogenic.
  • Calms and tones the skin’s natural complexion
  • Helps reduce the occurrence of breakouts and blemishes
  • Rich in antioxidants to maintain a youthful and healthy complexion
  • USDA Certified Organic, Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free and Fair Trade product
  • 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin
  • 95.75% of the total ingredients are from organic farming
  • Remaining 4.25% are naturally organic ingredients such as vitamins & minerals

How to use

Always make sure the serums are shaken well before applying so that all of the key ingredients are present in each application.

To ensure deep absorption, massage the serums into the skin thoroughly.

*Tip- After cleansing your skin and before applying the serum, splash your face with cool water. This will help to close your skin’s pores and the water on the face will also allow the serum to spread easily and evenly. Water also has a natural capillary action, which will help to pull the vitamins and minerals into your skin, leaving a healthy glow! (Each serum takes about 5 minutes to fully absorb)

Prefer a lighter hydration? Simply add a couple of drops of water to 1-2 pumps of this moisturizing serum on the palm of your hand, before applying to your face. The more water you add, the lighter the hydration will be. Our oil-based moisturizers are fully customizable to help you get the right hydration for your skin and the weather changes.

For optimum freshness, use within 6 months of opening.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Kukui Nut Oil, Orange Oil*, Eucalyptus Oil*, Lavender Flower Oil*, Lime Oil*, Geranium Oil*, Galbanum Oil*, Lemongrass Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E), Tea Tree Oil* *Ingredient from organic farming

Composition

The variety of unique ingredients chosen for this serum have been delicately balanced to effectively heal, hydrate and tone the skin achieving a healthy, clear complexion. (Non-comedogenic)

entry.title: Neroli Anti-Aging Facial Moisturizer for Dry Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Facial Moisturizers & Serums
Price: 32.00

This rich facial moisturizer offers a deep hydration and has been formulated to effectively heal and improve the skin’s overall texture and elasticity by uniting carefully selected, concentrated ingredients that reduce the signs of aging resulting in a healthy, even complexion.

For those who need a little extra moisture, we suggest applying E-Cream overtop of the Neroli for increased benefits and hydration.

Water also has a natural capillary action, which will help to pull the vitamins and minerals into your skin, leaving a healthy glow! (Each serum takes about 5 minutes to fully absorb)

For lighter hydration, simply add a couple of drops of water to 1-2 pumps of this moisturizing serum on the palm of your hand, before applying to your face. The more water you add, the lighter the hydration will be. Our oil-based moisturizers are fully customizable to help you get the right hydration for your skin and the weather changes.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Macadamia Nut Oil*, Apricot Kernel Oil*, Orange Oil*, Kukui Nut Oil, Neroli Flower Oil*, Jasmine oil*, Evening Primrose Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E), Zinc Oxide (Non-Nano) *Ingredient from organic farming

Composition

The wide variety of organic extracts used in this formulation has many revitalizing properties that help to heal and rejuvenate skin cells and stimulate collagen production. The key ingredients used in this serum and its purpose are similar to those found in the Nourish serum, but the Neroli provides heavier moisturizing capabilities for those who need a bit more hydration. (Non-comedogenic)

entry.title: Facial in a Jar Exfoliant & Softening Mask for All Skin Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Mask
Price: 21.00 - 35.00 (2 variants)

This unique product helps achieve smooth, vibrant skin by removing dead skin cells that clog pores and form blackheads. Exfoliating regularly improves skin’s elasticity and its ability to absorb moisture and retain the rich nutrients found in each one of our serums.

Features + Benefits

  • Softens & balances the skin’s complexion
  • Brightens the skin’s natural tone
  • Prevents blackheads and clogged pores
  • Helps to regenerate and renew the skin
  • Helps reduce the appearance of dark spots
  • Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free and Fair Trade
  • 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin
  • 82.28% of the total ingredients are from organic farming
  • Remaining 17.72% are naturally organic ingredients such as clay

    How to use

    After cleansing with Skin Essence Organics facial cleanser (Pure or Fresh), mix approx. 1 tsp of powder with 1.5 tsp of water and gently massage onto skin in a small circular motion. Relax for 2 to 3 minutes, (optional) reapplying water as necessary to keep the mask hydrated, and then rinse.

    Apply the Skin Essence Organics facial moisturizer of your choice.

    For optimum freshness, keep the product dry until time of use

    Why is it a powder?

    • MORE PRODUCT - Because there’s no added water, you get twice as much product, just add your own water!
    • CUSTOMIZABLE - The more water you mix with the powder the thinner/lighter the mask is, so our unique mineral mask can be customized perfectly to your specific skin preferences and needs.
    • STAYS FRESH - No water means your product will stay fresh much longer and no synthetic preservatives are needed.

    Ingredients

    Oat Powder*, Marshmallow Root Powder*, Jasmine Flowers*, White Kaolin Clay, Stevia Leaf Powder*, Corn Meal*, Green Tea Extract 

    Composition

    The various active ingredients in this formulation are ideal for healing, nourishing and softening the skin.

entry.title: Pure Gentle Facial Cleanser for Sensitive Skin or Rosacea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Cleanser
Price: 27.00

Pure is a gentle cleanser that has been specifically designed to effectively clean the skin without leaving it feeling dried or damaged.

Features + Benefits

  • Gently removes impurities, oil and make-up without drying the skin
  • Maintains the natural pH balance of the skin
  • Calms, soothes, & rehydrates dry skin
  • Helps reduce the appearance of redness & rosacea
  • Naturally softens & smoothes the skin
  • USDA Organic, Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

    How to use

    With approximately a ‘quarter’ sized amount of cleanser on the palm of your hand, rub both hands together to generate a slight lather.
    Massage onto skin and then rinse.

    For Removing Make-Up: Simply apply the cleanser to your face and then wipe it off using a warm damp face cloth.
    By doing this you will ensure your skin is fully cleansed and no make-up is left behind.

    For optimum freshness, use within 6 months of opening.

    Ingredients

    Vegetable Glycerin*, Saponified Organic Oils (Sunflower Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Water, Potassium hydroxide, Citric Acid), Comfrey Root Powder*, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Blue Chamomile Oil* *Ingredient from organic farming

    Composition

    The various extracts and minerals found in this amazing blend help to remove not only dirt and oils that can irritate the skin and lead to break-outs, but also works great in removing make-up.

entry.title: Golden Slumber Night Natural Face Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Routine Natural Goods
Type: Face Serum
Price: 64.00

Golden Slumber's got your number. All the kids are saying evening primrose is a mecca of ailing skin woes. My best friend's mom swears that black cumin will strengthen the skin on any human! Neroli is known in the ancient wisdom to bring balance to your skin and within. Pin a rose on your nose, to reduce redness woes. And vetiver, well, not much rhymes with vetiver... the closest thing is Jennifer, but she'll tell you, it's the skin magician that you never knew!

Features + Benefits

  • Predominant Scent of neroli, rose and lavender
  • Calming soothing and restful
  • 30ml, glass bottle with dropper
  • Vegan, made from all natural ingredients + cruelty free

How to use

Close up your P.M. routine with a cleansed face then warm 3 to 4 (or if you’re feeling it, more) drops of serum into your palms. Have a lovely sniff of that relaxing lavender, neroli, and rose before gently pressing all that goodness onto your face and décolleté (which is a more French way to say neck). Wear alone or under night cream. 

Ingredients

Prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil*, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil*, caprylic/capric triglyceride* (fractionated coconut oil), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, persea gratissima (avocado) oil*, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil*, rosa canina (rose hip) fruit oil*, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil*, vitis vinifera (grape) seed extract*, nigella sativa (black cumin) seed oil*, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, tocopherol (non-gmo, soy-free), aroma: lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil*, flavor oil* (organic rosemary antioxidant), citrus aurantium amara (bitter orange) flower oil*, vetiveria zizanoides root oil*, rosa damascena flower oil*, limonene**, linalool**, coumarin**, farnesol**, geraniol**, eugenol**, citronellol**. *organic ingredient. **naturally occurring in essential oil.

entry.title: Woke Glow Day Natural Face Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Routine Natural Goods
Type: Face Serum
Price: 58.00

Woke Glow has the goods to get you glowing in the A.M. All the kids will tell you that rosehip oil helps protect the skin from the weather with a healthy dose of vitamin C and can also help with acne! Word on the street is that sea buckthorn contains a ton of antioxidants to help with regeneration and elasticity. The seriously, mythical Myrhh is both a powerhouse and a smooth operator for rejuvenation and maximum moisture. Frankincense can't make up its mind because it can both reduce the appearance of pores and the look of wrinkles! Also, everything else in this bottle is ace for your face. So wake up woke, and embrace!

Features + Benefits

  • Predominant Scent of Myrrh, Frankincense & Bergamot (initially fresh and awakening, with a grounding undertone)
  • 30ml, glass bottle with dropper
  • Vegan, made from all natural ingredients + cruelty free

How to use

Start your a.m. routine with 3 to 4 (or if you’re feeling it, more) drops of serum warmed in the palm of your hands. Take a nice morning breath in of the frankincense, myrrh and bergamot, then press gently into your exquisite, clean face before applying any moisturizer or makeup. 

Ingredients

Caprylic/capric triglyceride* (fractionated coconut oil), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, rosa canina (rose hip) fruit oil*, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil*, hippophae rhamnoides (sea buckthorn) oil*, rubus idaeus (raspberry) seed oil*, tocopherol (non-gmo, soy-free), aroma: commiphora myrrha (myrrh) oil*, citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot) fruit oil*, boswellia serrata (frankincense) oil*, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, limonene**, linalool**, citral**, geraniol**, citronellol**. *organic ingredient. **naturally occurring in essential oil.

entry.title: Anti-Aging Rosehip Seed Oil for All Skin Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Facial Moisturizers & Serums
Price: 22.00

Rosehip seed oil is 100% pure, cold pressed and certified organic and naturally brightens the skin and offers luxurious hydration. It is a phenomenal option for toning the skin, reducing the appearance of sun damage and fine lines, preventing scarring, and rejuvenating skin cells.

Features + Benefits

  • Nourishes & hydrates all skin types
  • Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles and improves the overall complexion of the skin
  • Rich in vitamins & antioxidants for a youthful, healthy glow
  • Natural toning & brightening properties
  • Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, USDA Organic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free and Fair Trade
  • 100% of the total ingredients are from organic farming as calculated by the Eco-Cert Cosmetic Standard

How to use

To ensure deep absorption, massage into the skin thoroughly.

*Tip- After cleansing your skin and before applying the serum, splash your face with cool water. This will help to close your skin’s pores and the water on the face will also allow the serum to spread easily and evenly. Water also has a natural capillary action, which will help to pull the vitamins and minerals into your skin, leaving a healthy glow! (Each serum takes about 5 minutes to fully absorb)

Prefer a lighter hydration? Simply add a couple of drops of water to 1-2 pumps of this moisturizing serum on the palm of your hand, before applying to your face. The more water you add, the lighter the hydration will be.
Our oil-based moisturizers are fully customizable to help you get the right hydration for your skin and the weather changes.

For optimum freshness, use within 3 months of opening.

Composition

One of nature’s richest sources of Omega 3, vitamins and antioxidants, Rosehip Seed Oil delays the effects of aging, assists with skin cell regeneration, and stimulates collagen production in the skin. This results in a firmer, smoother, and more youthful complexion with improved elasticity. (Non-comedogenic)

Ingredients

100% Pure Rosehip Seed Oil* *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Triple Berry Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: NanaGlow Skincare
Type: Face Moisturizers
Price: 40.00

Feel hydrated every day! This daily cream nourishes and protects skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth and supple without any greasy residue. Experience the ultimate in pampering as this moisturizer delivers powerful nutrients that support healthy, vibrant skin. Carefully designed with clean ingredients that enhance the potent natural butters and oils that make this an excellent moisturizer for normal to dry skin.

Skin Types

  • Normal
  • Dry

    How to use

    After cleansing and toning, warm a small amount of Triple Berry Moisturizer between palms and smooth over face and neck. Recommended in the morning and evening for overnight restorative benefits.

    Ingredients

    Aqua (Purified Water), *Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, *Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, *Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Arachidyl Alcohol (and) Behenyl Alcohol (and) Arachidyl Glucoside, Glycerin, *Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Cetearyl Alcohol, *Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Lauryl Lactate, 1,2-Hexanediol (and) Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Astrocaryum Murumuru Butter, Gluconolactone, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Thioctic Acid, Dimethylaminoethanol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Iron Oxides, *Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, *Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, *Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Ubiquinone, *Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, *Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, *Soybean Lecithin.

    * Denotes organic ingredient

entry.title: KiwiLitchi Balancing Gel Moisturizer for Oily/Combination Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: NanaGlow Skincare
Type: Face Moisturizers
Price: 40.00

Oily-prone skin love this lightweight gel that offers just the right amount of hydration without the greasy residue that causes breakouts. Clarifying nutrients envelope skin in a balancing gel that absorbs quickly, with a clear matte finish that minimizes the shine of an oily appearance. Vitamin A, Vitamin C and Salicylic Acid support clarity of tone and optimal radiance.

Skin Types

  • Oily
  • Combination

    How to use

    After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount of moisturizing gel to fingertips and gently pat onto skin. Recommended as a daily moisturizer, for morning and evening use. *This gel-hydrator can also be applied as a spot treatment targeting stubborn blemishes.

    Ingredients

    Aqua (Purified Water), *Glycerin, Sorbitol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol (and) Caprylyl Glycol, Retinyl Palmitate, Arginine, Dehydroacetic Acid, Litchi Chinensis Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Water, *Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, *Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, *Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, *Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Arbutin, Salicylic Acid, *Soybean Lecithin, Iron Oxides, *Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract.

    * Denotes organic ingredient
